directions.dialogText: We have hidden the values of some \`word\` variables, but luckily we can pass values from one variable to another. Use the \`+\` operator to combine \`word1\` and \`word2\` in the \`compound1\` variable.

levels.mission: Use the \`+\` operator to combine \`word1\` and \`word2\` and create a longer word in the \`compound1\` variable.
levels.tools:
\`compound1\`- empty variable

\`word1\`- variable with a hidden string value

\`word2\`- variable with a hidden string value
levels.tips:
Your code should look like this:

     var compound1 = word2 + word1;

directions.dialogText: Good work! Let's add another hidden \`word\` variable. Give \`compound1\` a value by combining two of the \`word\` variables using the \`+\` operator.

levels.mission: Give \`compound1\` a value by combining two of the \`word\` variables using the \`+\` operator.
levels.tools:
\`compound1\`- empty variable

\`word1\`- variable with a hidden string value

\`word2\`- variable with a hidden string value

\`word3\`- variable with a hidden string value
levels.tips: The word you're looking for is something the dentist might give you.

levels.mission: Give \`compound1\` a value by combining two of the \`word\` variables using the \`+\` operator.
levels.tools:
\`compound1\`- empty variable

\`word1\`- variable with a hidden string value

\`word2\`- variable with a hidden string value

\`word3\`- variable with a hidden string value

\`word4\`- variable with a hidden string value
levels.tips: The word you're looking for is something you can ride.

directions.dialogText: Great! Now can you make TWO different \`compounds\` by combining \`word\` variables?

levels.mission: Give \`compound1\` and \`compound2\` values by combining \`word\` variables using the \`+\` operator.
levels.tools:
\`compound1\`- empty variable

\`word1\`- variable with a hidden string value

\`word2\`- variable with a hidden string value

\`word3\`- variable with a hidden string value
levels.tips:
The first word is something you eat.

The second word is a very small building.

levels.mission: Give \`compound1\` and \`compound2\` values by combining \`word\` variables using the \`+\` operator.
levels.tools:
\`compound1\`- empty variable

\`word1\`- variable with a hidden string value

\`word2\`- variable with a hidden string value

\`word3\`- variable with a hidden string value
levels.tips: Both words are things that help you find your way in the dark.

directions.dialogText: Ok! You're doing great so far! Do you think you can make THREE different \`compound\` words this time?

levels.mission: Give \`compound1\`,  \`compound2\`, and \`compound3\` values by combining \`word\` variables using the \`+\` operator.

\`word3\`- variable with a hidden string value

\`word4\`- variable with a hidden string value
levels.tips: All three compound words are items used in playing sports.
